turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two large thick crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first pizza, I would like a supreme pizza with extra onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, how about the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For that second pizza, I would like triple pepperoni and heavy sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So just to confirm your request: 2 large thick crust pizzas, 1 supreme with extra onions and a triple pepperoni with heavy sauce. is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 45 minutes.
